to appear/present/now/existing/current

sentences.english: That you your self being extant well might show.
sentences.chinese: 好让你自己生动地现身说法。

sentences.english: He spent his life spreading the gospel of success as directly and as personally as he could.
sentences.chinese: 他尽可能地用直接现身说法的方式传播成功的福音。

sentences.english: We are going to be able, perhaps, to finally know how to make them speak.
sentences.chinese: 也许，我们最后将会知道，如何让它们现身说法。

sentences.english: And his class might be visited by pregnant women and nursing mothers with their babies.
sentences.chinese: 届时课上还可能有孕妇和带着婴儿的奶妈来现身说法。
